name: Tower Trouble
description:
Tower Trouble was created for Global Game Jam 2020 where the theme was 'Repair'.

Pieces of the tower have been dislodged, click on the pieces to return them to the right place.

Controls:
left and right arrow keys to turn around the tower.Left mouse button to click the missing pieces back where they need to go.

Since this was a gamejam game, it doesn't really have an end state. Look at it as a prototype. I might continue it this summer.
